1605800.name: Almighty: Kill Your Gods Soundtrack
1605800.description:
The realm of Anun is rife with danger! Alpha, hunt, provide and protect with the Official Soundtrack to Almighty: Kill Your Gods. This unique soundtrack was created to help you find strength in the pack, and includes all 15 music tracks from the game.

Music By: Stafford Bawler
Additional Tracks "Flames" and "Flames Extended" By: Digital Brains
